data.description: A protocol droid specialized in etiquette, customs, translation, and torture.

data.name: 50R-T
data.description: A highly intelligent Droid who can quickly calculate the odds and determine how to defy them

data.name: ARC Trooper
data.description: Powerful Clone Attacker that can command a Blaster Turret on the battlefield

data.name: Aayla Secura
data.description: Versatile attacker with high survivability through Dodge, Hitpoints, and self healing.

data.name: Admiral Ackbar
data.description: Rebel Support that can Dispel debuffs and grant allies extra turns

data.name: Admiral Piett
data.description: An ambitious Imperial Officer who supports his allies while plotting their demise

data.name: Admiral Raddus
data.description: A brilliant Rebel tactician who supports his allies by buying time for them to carry out their mission

data.name: Admiral Trench
data.description: A cunning Separatist admiral who supports his allies with potent buffs and ruins his foes with debilitating debuffs

data.name: Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum)
data.description: Enduring Rebel Attacker who shrugs off debuffs and consumes buffs to deal extra damage

data.name: Ahsoka Tano (Snips)
data.description: Versatile Attacker who constantly assists while healing and dispelling

data.name: Amilyn Holdo
data.description: Seasoned Resistance Tank with powerful ally support and enemy debuffs

data.name: Asajj Ventress
data.description: Nightsister controller with healing who generates attack power as characters are defeated

data.name: Aurra Sing
data.description: Deadly Bounty Hunter that has increased damage while Stealthed

data.name: B1 Battle Droid
data.description: Fragile Separatist Attacker that overwhelms their enemies with numbers

data.name: B2 Super Battle Droid
data.description: Droid Tank that relentlessly punishes enemies that evade attacks or damage allies

data.name: BB-8
data.description: Persistent Resistance Droid who empowers allies by circulating Secret Intel

data.name: BT-1
data.description: A blastomech prototype droid who is known for destroying the Tarkin Initiative base in which he was created.

data.name: Barriss Offee
data.description: Jedi Healer that can balance party Health and Dispel allied Jedi frequently

data.name: Bastila Shan
data.description: Strong Jedi Support that grants allies an overwhelming first turn with her Leader ability

data.name: Bastila Shan (Fallen)
data.description: Strong Sith Support who inflicts a large number of debuffs including Shock, Fear, and Corrupted Battle Meditation

data.name: Baze Malbus
data.description: Fearsome Rebel Tank who Taunts, dispels buffs, and inflicts debuffs

data.name: Ben Solo
data.description: A powerful Force user whose internal struggles have long placed him on the edge of light and dark

data.name: Biggs Darklighter
data.description: Rebel Support with Critical Hit synergies who calls Assists

data.name: Bistan
data.description: Wild Rebel Attacker who gains Frenzy, debuffs enemies, and removes Turn Meter

data.name: Bo-Katan (Mand'alor)
data.description: A brave leader of the Mandalorians who wields the Darksaber and leads her allies into battle

data.name: Bo-Katan Kryze
data.description: A Mandalorian leader that unites fellow Mandalorians and rallies them to assist.

data.name: Boba Fett
data.description: Ruthless Bounty Hunter Attacker who ignores Taunts, Ability Blocks and self-revives

data.name: Boba Fett, Scion of Jango
data.description: Infamous Bounty Hunter Attacker with a variety of debuffs and synergy with both Bounty Hunters and Scoundrels

data.name: Bodhi Rook
data.description: Clever Rebel Support who spots enemy units for his allies

data.name: Boss Nass
data.description: A boisterous Leader who commands the Gungans of Otoh Gunga with pride and utilizes their unique technology to achieve victory

data.name: Bossk
data.description: Bounty Hunter Tank that constantly regenerates Health and Protection

data.name: Boushh (Leia Organa)
data.description: A princess in disguise, fooling Jabba's court with strong Thermal Detonator synergy

data.name: C-3PO
data.description: Evasive support character that Confuses foes and strengthens mixed-faction interplay with Translation.

data.name: CC-2224 "Cody"
data.description: Clone Attacker that Stuns and calls tons of Assists

data.name: CT-21-0408 "Echo"
data.description: Clone Trooper Support that automatically assists allies and can dispel all enemy buffs

data.name: CT-5555 "Fives"
data.description: Tank with high Defense, enemy Speed reduction, and team-wide stat bonuses

data.name: CT-7567 "Rex"
data.description: Clone Leader who fiercely supports and protects his 501st and Clone Trooper allies

data.name: Cad Bane
data.description: Bounty Hunter Support with a powerful Stun and bonuses against Jedi characters

data.name: Cal Kestis
data.description: A determined Force user who uses his unique abilities to support his allies and manipulate the flow of battle

data.name: Canderous Ordo
data.description: Powerful attacker who can make short work of enemy Tanks

data.name: Captain Drogan
data.description: Respected Rebel Captain who employs coordinated strikes to ruin enemy forces and turn the tide of battle

data.name: Captain Enoch
data.description: Ominous captain of the guard who keeps his forces fighting even at the edge of defeat

data.name: Captain Han Solo
data.description: Daring Rebel Support that risks himself to Revive allies and Daze enemies

data.name: Captain Phasma
data.description: High-damage First Order support that can grant allies many extra attacks

data.name: Captain Rex
data.description: A former Captain of the 501st Clone Battalion and veteran Support of countless conflicts

data.name: Captain Tarpals
data.description: A powerful Gungan Attacker who crushes his foes with area damage and wrecks debuffed enemies

data.name: Cara Dune
data.description: A Scoundrel/Rebel Tank who gains benefits when being led by either.

data.name: Carth Onasi
data.description: Old Republic soldier that excels at clearing waves of enemies

data.name: Cassian Andor
data.description: Rebel Support who buffs allies at the start of battle and debuffs enemies during battle

data.name: Cere Junda
data.description: Resilient Support who aids her allies with an assortment of different buffs and punishes fast opponents

data.name: Chewbacca
data.description: Mighty Rebel Attacker who Guards the weakest ally

data.name: Chief Chirpa
data.description: Ewok Leader that greatly improves ally Basic abilities

data.name: Chief Nebit
data.description: Cunning Jawa Tank with Stealth synergies who can reduce cooldowns

data.name: Chirrut Îmwe
data.description: Balanced Rebel Attacker who dispels debuffs, heals allies, and grants Tenacity Up

data.name: Chopper
data.description: Surly Phoenix Support who Taunts and Dispels, and can recover Phoenix cooldowns

data.name: Clone Sergeant - Phase I
data.description: Clone Attacker with AoE damage and Turn Meter Reduction

data.name: Clone Wars Chewbacca
data.description: Durable Tank with both Taunt and self-Healing

data.name: Colonel Starck
data.description: Offensive Support who provides critical buffs and removes enemy Turn Meter

data.name: Commander Ahsoka Tano
data.description: Legendary Master of Jar'Kai and Shien form Attacker, who deals high damage to a single target.

data.name: Commander Luke Skywalker
data.description: Determined Rebel hero who can ignore debuffs or ignore Taunts

data.name: Coruscant Underworld Police
data.description: Support that shuts down enemies with Stuns and Offense Down

data.name: Count Dooku
data.description: Disciplined Separatist Attacker with high damage, counter attacks, and debuff capabilities

data.name: Dark Trooper
data.description: An Imperial Remnant attacker whose abilities are modified by the amount in Dark Trooper Squad

data.name: Dark Trooper Moff Gideon
data.description: Imperial Remnant Leader that sacrifices his weakest allies to stay alive and controls the battle with insight

data.name: Darth Bane
data.description: Ancient Sith Lord spoken of in whispers who defeats foes through strength and cunning and believes only the strong should live to wield the power of the dark side

data.name: Darth Malak
data.description: Brutal Sith Tank who terrorizes and drains enemies to stay alive

data.name: Darth Malgus
data.description: Legendary Sith Lord who causes doubt among his foes and heralds the return of the Sith Empire

data.name: Darth Maul
data.description: Deadly Attacker that gains power and extra turns as enemies are defeated

data.name: Darth Nihilus
data.description: Sith Support that can instantly defeat enemies by draining cooldowns

data.name: Darth Revan
data.description: Ruthless Sith Lord that is extremely effective at taking down the enemy leader

data.name: Darth Sidious
data.description: Brutal Attacker effective against Healers and Jedi while boosting allied Criticals as a Leader

data.name: Darth Sion
data.description: Aggressive Sith tank that becomes stronger with Hatred

data.name: Darth Talon
data.description: Nimble Sith attacker whose loyalty and lethality is without question

data.name: Darth Traya
data.description: Sith support who punishes enemies for relying on others

data.name: Darth Vader
data.description: Fearsome Attacker that applies AoE Damage Over Time, and crushes debuffed targets for extra turns

data.name: Dash Rendar
data.description: Charismatic Scoundrel Leader who gives Scoundrel allies Prepared

data.name: Dathcha
data.description: Versatile Support able to Ability Block and Stealth, effective against Droids or with Jawas

data.name: Death Trooper
data.description: Terrifying Empire Attacker who inflicts debilitating debuffs and prevents revives

data.name: Death Trooper (Peridea)
data.description: A relentless Attacker whose efforts to destroy the enemy are persistent, even after death

data.name: Dengar
data.description: Adaptable Scoundrel attacker that Stuns and inflicts Tenacity Down.

data.name: Director Krennic
data.description: Intimidating Empire Support who inflicts devastating debuffs and slows enemies

data.name: Doctor Aphra
data.description: An inventive and chaotic Support who employs dangerous treasures and technology to empower her team and unravel her foes

data.name: Droideka
data.description: Destructive Droid attacker that punishes fast enemies from behind its deflector shield

data.name: Echo
data.description: Loyal Clone Trooper who supports his allies in battle

data.name: Eeth Koth
data.description: Stunning Jedi Support extremely effective against Droids

data.name: Eighth Brother
data.description: A stealthy member of the Inquisitorious with an arsenal of tricks and weapons to surprise his opponent.

data.name: Embo
data.description: Deadly Bounty Hunter Attacker that consumes his Protection to boost his damage

data.name: Emperor Palpatine
data.description: Overwhelming Sith Support who inflicts Shock and can Stun targets for multiple turns

data.name: Enfys Nest
data.description: Powerhouse attacker that stacks Protection when attacked, then dismantles enemy defenses with Dispels and Turn Meter manipulation

data.name: Ewok Elder
data.description: Ewok Healer that specializes in Revives

data.name: Ewok Scout
data.description: Powerful single-target Attacker that becomes evasive with Ewok allies

data.name: Ezra Bridger
data.description: Versatile Phoenix Attacker that can perform a variety of effects based on the Roles of allies

data.name: Ezra Bridger (Exile)
data.description: An exiled Support who uses his connection to the Force to assist his allies

data.name: Fennec Shand
data.description: Lethal Bounty Hunter capable of taking on the most dangerous foes

data.name: Fifth Brother
data.description: A powerful Inquisitor that specializes in supporting the purge of all Jedi by applying devastating debuffs.

data.name: Finn
data.description: Resistance tank that keeps the pressure up with a balance between offense and defense

data.name: First Order Executioner
data.description: Merciless First Order Attacker who executes powerful attacks

data.name: First Order Officer
data.description: First Order support that grants Advantage and can manipulate both ally and enemy Turn Meters

data.name: First Order SF TIE Pilot
data.description: Subversive First Order Attacker who buffs allies and disrupts enemies

data.name: First Order Stormtrooper
data.description: First Order tank that uses Advantage to disrupt enemies

data.name: First Order TIE Pilot
data.description: First Order attacker that can deal extreme damage in a single turn with Advantage

data.name: Gamorrean Guard
data.description: Aggressive tank that Taunts and Counters with multiple Damage Over Time effects

data.name: Gar Saxon
data.description: Leader who grants Empire allies Counter Chance and Assists them when they Counter Attack

data.name: Garazeb "Zeb" Orrelios
data.description: Versatile Phoenix Tank with wide variety of effects for allies or enemies with or without debuffs

data.name: General Grievous
data.description: Aggressive Attacker that grows increasingly stronger as the Droids around him fall. Although he hates being called a droid, he counts as one in combat.

data.name: General Hux
data.description: Ruthless First Order Support that can prevent enemies from counterattacking.

data.name: General Kenobi
data.description: Vigorous Jedi Tank who gains Foresight, dispels debuffs to grant buffs, and calls buffed allies to Assist

data.name: General Skywalker
data.description: Fierce Jedi Attacker who protects his battalion at all costs

data.name: General Veers
data.description: Aggressive Empire Support that becomes stronger as enemies are defeated

data.name: Geonosian Brood Alpha
data.description: Geonosian Support that swarms enemies with summoned allies and Hive Mind

data.name: Geonosian Soldier
data.description: Aggressive Attacker who calls assists and grants powerful offensive bonuses to Geonosian allies

data.name: Geonosian Spy
data.description: Stealthy Geonosian Attacker who Exposes enemies and has high damage potential

data.name: Grand Admiral Thrawn
data.description: Calculating Empire Leader who can halt enemies in their tracks, and grants Empire allies a new Special ability

data.name: Grand Inquisitor
data.description: The calculating and relentless master of the Inquisitorius who specializes in dealing with Jedi

data.name: Grand Master Yoda
data.description: Masterful Jedi support that can replicate enemy buffs and share them with allies

data.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
data.description: Offensive Empire Support with crushing AoE debuffs

data.name: Great Mothers
data.description: A trio of mysterious Supports who wield the threads of fate and destiny to doom their enemies and bless their allies

data.name: Greedo
data.description: Deadly Attacker that gains extra attacks from Critical Hits

data.name: Greef Karga
data.description: Bounty Hunter Support that provides recovery and assist calls

data.name: Gungan Boomadier
data.description: Gungan Boomadier's swift attacks are most amplified when capitalizing on debuffed enemies and gains impressive bonuses while the Shield Generator is active.

data.name: Gungan Phalanx
data.description: Gungan Phalanx is a Tank who shields his allies and assists them when they are attacked instead of him

data.name: HK-47
data.description: Offensive Attacker with powerful Darth Revan synergy

data.name: Han Solo
data.description: Daring Attacker that stacks Criticals in his favor and always shoots first

data.name: Hera Syndulla
data.description: Cunning Phoenix Support that allows Phoenix allies to share their Unique abilities with each other

data.name: Hermit Yoda
data.description: Jedi recluse who imparts sage wisdom in the ways of the Force

data.name: Hondo Ohnaka
data.description: The unparalleled Scoundrel willing to play all angles for his own gains

data.name: Hoth Rebel Scout
data.description: Single target attacker with crit synergies and speed building abilities.

data.name: Hoth Rebel Soldier
data.description: Support character that debuffs, taunts, and defensively buffs, with Rebel and anti-Empire synergies.

data.name: Hunter
data.description: Tactical leader of the Bad Batch who subtly destroys his enemies.

data.name: IG-100 MagnaGuard
data.description: Disruptive Droid Tank that Taunts and takes an extra turn before it is defeated

data.name: IG-11
data.description: Versatile Healer with strong Scoundrel and Droid synergies

data.name: IG-12 & Grogu
data.description: A restructured assassin droid who heals allies and disrupts enemies

data.name: IG-86 Sentinel Droid
data.description: Droid Attacker with a powerful Droid Assist and devastating Criticals

data.name: IG-88
data.description: Droid Attacker with debuffs and a damage bonus against debuffed enemies

data.name: Iden Versio
data.description: Tenacious Empire Attacker who expertly takes out foes while supporting her squad

data.name: Ima-Gun Di
data.description: Supportive Tank that boost ally defense and grants Jedi allies Counter Chance

data.name: Imperial Probe Droid
data.description: Imperial Droid who reveals and tracks enemies with Target Lock

data.name: Imperial Super Commando
data.description: An Empire Attacker with counter mechanics who dispels buffs and applies buff immunity

data.name: Jabba the Hutt
data.description: A ruthless crime boss who exerts his influence on others to control the flow of battle to support his criminal underworld and Hutt Cartel enforcers

data.name: Jango Fett
data.description: Notorious Bounty Hunter that exploits debuffed foes and inflicts Burning

data.name: Jar Jar Binks
data.description: A Gungan Support who isn’t afraid to interject into the battle and offer his own brand of help, frustrating the enemy.

data.name: Jawa
data.description: Attacker effective against debuffed enemies as well as Droids

data.name: Jawa Engineer
data.description: High-speed Jawa Healer with a Critical Chance buff and both Jawa and Droid synergy

data.name: Jawa Scavenger
data.description: Versatile Jawa Support who can detonate Thermal Detonators to inflict a large variety of status effects

data.name: Jedi Consular
data.description: Well-rounded Jedi Healer with a mix of offense and defense

data.name: Jedi Knight Anakin
data.description: High-pressure Jedi attacker that punishes enemies for wounding his allies

data.name: Jedi Knight Cal Kestis
data.description: Utilizing different lightsaber masteries, Jedi Knight Cal Kestis weaves between offensive and defensive stances to claim victory over his opponents

data.name: Jedi Knight Guardian
data.description: Tenacious Jedi tank with crippling debuffs and natural recovery at low Health

data.name: Jedi Knight Luke Skywalker
data.description: Stalwart Jedi hero of legend who ascends to victorious heights alongside his Jedi allies through the will of the Force

data.name: Jedi Knight Revan
data.description: Fabled Jedi leader who controls the battle with a wide mix of powerful abilities

data.name: Jedi Master Kenobi
data.description: Renowned Jedi Master that provides damage and support through a diverse set of abilities

data.name: Jedi Master Luke Skywalker
data.description: The wizened Jedi master of legend who empowers his Jedi allies with the knowledge and skills he has obtained

data.name: Jolee Bindo
data.description: Potent Jedi Healer with high durability and resistance to disruption

data.name: Juhani
data.description: Unique Jedi Tank who dispels debuffs from Old Republic allies and becomes more dangerous below full Health

data.name: Jyn Erso
data.description: Offensive Rebel Leader who gains Advantage, Stuns enemies, revives Rebel allies and grants them Potency Up

data.name: K-2SO
data.description: Rebel Tank who Taunts and Counter Attacks

data.name: Kanan Jarrus
data.description: Durable Phoenix Tank that keeps enemy Offense crippled and allies healthy

data.name: Kelleran Beq
data.description: Known as the Sabered Hand for his lightsaber mastery, Kelleran Beq used his Force knowledge to mentor younglings and rescued Grogu during Order 66

data.name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
data.description: Formidable Jedi Master who shifts between Ataru and Makashi lightsaber forms

data.name: Kit Fisto
data.description: Versatile Jedi Attacker with multi-attack, Counter Chance, and a variety of ally buffs

data.name: Krrsantan
data.description: Infamous Bounty Hunter Tank with an intimidating presence and unstoppable raw strength

data.name: Kuiil
data.description: A supportive mechanic who aids Droids and Scoundrels.

data.name: Kyle Katarn
data.description: A Force-sensitive Rebel operative and Jedi Knight

data.name: Kylo Ren
data.description: Versatile First Order attacker that can reuse special attacks when damaged

data.name: Kylo Ren (Unmasked)
data.description: Tough First Order Tank with a powerful Stun

data.name: L3-37
data.description: Droid Tank that can dispel allies and has multiple ways to increase her stats permanently

data.name: Lando Calrissian
data.description: Scoundrel leader with high offense and excellent Critical Hit synergy

data.name: Leia Organa
data.description: Leia Organa, the tactical leader of the Rebellion and high priority target of the Empire, dictates the precise strikes of the battle while inspiring and defending her allies

data.name: Lobot
data.description: Rebel Support that can reliably inflict Defense Down, clear allied debuffs, and speed up allied Droids

data.name: Logray
data.description: Sage Ewok Support who can Daze enemies and grant Ewok allies many buffs

data.name: Lord Vader
data.description: Legendary Sith Lord who utilizes the actions of others to empower his own potential and is not to be underestimated

data.name: Luke Skywalker (Farmboy)
data.description: Attacker that can boost his own Critical Rate, then disable enemies with Critical Hits

data.name: Luminara Unduli
data.description: Versatile attacker with ability block and powerful party heal.

data.name: Luthen Rael
data.description: A cold-hearted Support who's willing to use any resource necessary to further his goals

data.name: Mace Windu
data.description: Aggressive Jedi tank with devastating damage if left unchecked

data.name: Magmatrooper
data.description: Resilient Attacker that recovers quickly from debuffs and deals potent AoE damage

data.name: Mara Jade, The Emperor's Hand
data.description: Dark Side force user Attacker who uses her allies to boost her own power and supports Emperor Palpatine

data.name: Master Qui-Gon
data.description: A bold Support willing to take a chance to save and assist his allies.

data.name: Maul
data.description: Unrelenting attacker that uses his anguish to crush his foes

data.name: Merrin
data.description: A Nightsister witch who proactively defends her allies and inflicts enemies with Plague

data.name: Mission Vao
data.description: Slippery Scoundrel Attacker who blinds her enemies

data.name: Mob Enforcer
data.description: Scoundrel Support with enemy debuff ability and a thermal detonator.

data.name: Moff Gideon
data.description: Empire Leader that can lead a fireteam into battle and punish enemies with the Leader tag

data.name: Mon Mothma
data.description: Rebel Leader who supports and rallies her allies

data.name: Morgan Elsbeth
data.description: A Nightsister Tank dedicated to protecting her Nightsister allies through defensive measures

data.name: Mother Talzin
data.description: Vicious Nightsister Leader who inflicts Plague, preventing enemies from Dispelling debuffs

data.name: Night Trooper
data.description: A relentless Attacker who spreads Blight among their foes

data.name: Nightsister Acolyte
data.description: Stealth attacker with some enemy debuffing and self healing ability.

data.name: Nightsister Initiate
data.description: Critical-focused Attacker that can render enemies immune to buffs

data.name: Nightsister Spirit
data.description: Veiled Nightsister Attacker who Dispels, Stuns, and gains Foresight

data.name: Nightsister Zombie
data.description: Vile Nightsister Tank who inflicts Tenacity Down and can't be stopped from reviving endlessly

data.name: Ninth Sister
data.description: A ruthless member of the feared Inquisitorius who will stop at nothing in her hunt for the Jedi

data.name: Nute Gunray
data.description: Separatist Support who specializes in sabotaging enemy strategies

data.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Old Ben)
data.description: Durable Jedi Tank able to shut down enemy offense with multiple debuffs

data.name: Old Daka
data.description: Defensive Nightsister Healer who Stuns and Revives

data.name: Omega
data.description: Clever and empathetic attacker who utilizes buffs, debuffs, and the presence of her Bad Batch allies to take out her foes.

data.name: Padawan Obi-Wan
data.description: Disciplined Attacker who utilizes years of Jedi training to protect his allies and overwhelm his foes

data.name: Padmé Amidala
data.description: Courageous leader who continuously helps her allies and adapts to any circumstance

data.name: Pao
data.description: Unrelenting Rebel Attacker with a mighty battle cry

data.name: Paploo
data.description: Resourceful Ewok Tank with assist and buff synergies

data.name: Paz Vizsla
data.description: A proud and stalwart Mandalorian Tank who upholds the Creed while laying down heavy fire from his blaster cannon

data.description: Jedi Tank with Clone synergy, reliable enemy Dispel and anti-Stealth

data.name: Poe Dameron
data.description: Resistance Tank with a Taunt that inflicts Expose for big reversals

data.name: Poggle the Lesser
data.description: Support for Geonosian and Separatist allies, with strong offensive synergies

data.name: Princess Kneesaa
data.description: A small but mighty Attacker Ewok, here to fight for Bright Tree Village

data.name: Princess Leia
data.description: Well-rounded Rebel Attacker with extra attacks, Stealth, and team Critical bonuses.

data.name: Qi'ra
data.description: High-utility Support that uses Prepared, debuffs, and an adaptable Leader ability to overwhelm enemies

data.name: Queen Amidala
data.description: Queen of Naboo who will stop at nothing to protect her people, and her people will stop at nothing to protect her

data.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
data.description: Versatile attacker focused on generating extra attacks.

data.name: R2-D2
data.description: Versatile Support Droid that inflicts Burning and grants allies Stealth

data.name: Range Trooper
data.description: Aggressive Empire Support that provides other Imperial Trooper allies with Assist chance

data.name: Rebel Officer Leia Organa
data.description: Tenacious Rebel Attacker that counters debuffs and is more effective against healthy targets

data.name: Resistance Hero Finn
data.description: Supportive Attacker whose inspiration empowers his allies on the battlefield

data.description: Offensive Attacker who overpowers his enemies with debilitating effects

data.description: Resistance attacker that can use Expose, Foresight, and Turn Meter gains to surprise enemies

data.name: Resistance Trooper
data.description: Opportunistic Resistance attacker that can deal heavy damage to debuffed enemies

data.name: Rey
data.description: Resistance Leader who safeguards her allies by providing powerful shields and delivering high damage

data.description: Resilient Resistance Tank who avenges debuffed allies and controls the battlefield

data.description: A brave Resistance Attacker who can Stun and grant allies buffs.

data.name: Royal Guard
data.description: Versatile Empire Tank that punishes enemies for attacking other allies

data.name: STAP

data.name: Sana Starros
data.description: Scoundrel turned Rebel sympathizer that helps her team deal area of effect damage

data.description: An extreme guerrilla fighter who leads his Partisans against the Empire

data.name: Scarif Rebel Pathfinder

data.description: A stealthy soldier from the Galactic Empire that supports her teammates from the shadows

data.description: Ruthless Inquisitor Attacker that specializes in eliminating Jedi

data.description: Inquisitorius Healer that helps her squad eliminate the Jedi

data.description: Inspiring Jedi Leader with heightened reflexes

data.name: Sith Assassin

data.name: Sith Empire Trooper
data.description: Sith Tank who Taunts and ignores enemy Protection

data.name: Sith Eternal Emperor
data.description: Cunning Emperor of the Sith that eliminates his enemies with the overwhelming power of the dark side

data.name: Sith Marauder

data.description: Elite trooper with powerful First Order and Sith synergy and high damage potential.

data.name: Skiff Guard (Lando Calrissian)

data.name: Snowtrooper

data.name: Starkiller
data.description: A powerful Dark Side Force User whose inner conflict lifts up other Force Users

data.name: Stormtrooper
data.description: Empire Tank that can Taunt and surprise enemies with unpredictable damage

data.description: Geonosian Tank who punishes attackers with a variety of negative effects

data.name: Supreme Leader Kylo Ren
data.description: Destructive Leader of the First Order who overpowers his enemies with brutal attacks

data.name: T3-M4
data.description: Offensive Droid who supports a Droid team with extra stats and debuffs the enemy team

data.name: TIE Fighter Pilot
data.description: Empire Attacker who inflicts Buff Immunity and gains Foresight

data.name: Talia
data.description: Aggressive Healer that sacrifices Health so allies can recover Health and Turn Meter

data.name: Tarfful
data.description: Ferocious Support that provides Defense to his allies and punishes enemies with Provoked

data.name: Taron Malicos
data.description: A formidable Attacker and former Jedi with dark ambitions who fights on the edge of madness

data.name: Tech
data.description: Stealthy support character that gives Translation to other Clone Troopers and applies Target Lock to enemies.

data.name: Teebo
data.description: Ewok stealth character with stealth synergies and some control ability.

data.name: The Armorer
data.description: A Mandalorian leader and support unit that collects beskar to buff her team and rally them.

data.name: The Mandalorian
data.description: Powerful Mandalorian bounty hunter who relies on critical hits to overwhelm his enemies

data.name: The Mandalorian (Beskar Armor)
data.description: Fearless Scoundrel leader who hunts down enemies to protect his allies

data.name: Third Sister
data.description: A merciless Inquisitor who will stop at nothing till she achieves her goals

data.name: Threepio & Chewie
data.description: Rebel Attacker duo that can distract their enemies with Blind and deal significant damage to all enemies in multi-encounter battles

data.name: Tusken Chieftain
data.description: A strong tribal leader who protects his allies with Momentum and inflicts foes with damaging effects

data.name: Tusken Raider
data.description: Durable Attacker with Tusken Synergy and a strong Assist attack

data.name: Tusken Shaman
data.description: Offensive Healer that can also boost Offense and rapidly stack Damage Over Time effects

data.name: Tusken Warrior
data.description: Brave and fearless Tusken warrior whose attacks become stronger with Momentum

data.name: URoRRuR'R'R
data.description: Tusken Support that can Stun frequently and speed up Tuskens for surprise attacks

data.name: Ugnaught
data.description: Anti-Droid Support with AoE damage and high Evasion against Droids

data.name: Vandor Chewbacca
data.description: Aggressive Scoundrel Tank that provides Protection Recovery for his allies when they are attacked

data.name: Veteran Smuggler Chewbacca
data.description: Lumbering attacker who accumulates Offensive capabilities as enemies take actions

data.name: Veteran Smuggler Han Solo
data.description: Scoundrel Attacker with multi-attack and multiple devastating debuffs

data.name: Visas Marr
data.description: Offensive Healer with strong anti-Sith synergy

data.name: Wampa
data.description: Fearsome predator from Hoth that attacks constantly with increasing strength

data.name: Wat Tambor
data.description: Separatist Support who distributes powerful Tech to his allies

data.name: Wedge Antilles
data.description: Rebel Attacker with a strong offensive opening

data.name: Wicket
data.description: Jittery Ewok Attacker with Critical Hit and Stealth synergies

data.name: Wrecker
data.description: Resilient Clone Trooper who protects his allies and gets empowered when taking damage

data.name: Young Han Solo
data.description: Scoundrel Attacker who becomes more deadly over time

data.name: Young Lando Calrissian
data.description: Scoundrel Attacker that takes advantage of debuffed enemies and deals ever-increasing damage

data.name: Zaalbar
data.description: Versatile Scoundrel Tank with a powerful AoE attack and reactive Taunt

data.name: Zam Wesell
data.description: Lightning fast Scoundrel attacker that inflicts Evasion Down and detonates bombs.

data.name: Zorii Bliss
data.description: An elusive Smuggler that uses her spice runner skills to help the Resistance

data.name: Ahsoka Tano's Jedi Starfighter
data.description: Versatile Jedi Attacker that uses dispels and buffs to adapt to the battle

data.name: Anakin's Eta-2 Starfighter
data.description: Aggressive Jedi Attacker that bolsters Offense and retaliates when allies are in trouble

data.name: B-28 Extinction-class Bomber
data.description: Aggressive Sith Tank with a passive Taunt and self-preservation tactics

data.name: BTL-B Y-wing Starfighter
data.description: Galactic Republic Tank that can withstand significant damage and Taunts when its allies are in need

data.name: Biggs Darklighter's X-wing
data.description: Heroic Rebel Tank that can exploit Target Lock for Taunts and Assists

data.name: Bistan's U-wing
data.description: Elusive Rebel Support that boosts ally Turn Meter while using Stealth and Target Lock

data.name: Cassian's U-wing
data.description: Evasive Rebel Support ship that turns the tide of battle with Stealth and Turn Meter manipulation

data.name: Chimaera
data.description: Tactical Empire Capital Ship that shuts down enemy Capital Ships and manipulates the flow of battle

data.name: Clone Sergeant's ARC-170
data.description: Reliable Clone Tank that both inflicts and exploits Target Lock

data.name: Comeuppance
data.description: Strong Support ship whose dramatic entrance empowers Resistance allies.

data.name: Ebon Hawk
data.description: Durable Old Republic Support that dispels enemies and prevents Target Lock

data.name: Emperor's Shuttle
data.description: Versatile Support that boosts Empire and Sith survivability while debuffing enemies

data.name: Endurance
data.description: Defensive Jedi Capital Ship that uses Valor to gain a huge Speed advantage

data.name: Executor
data.description: Empire Capital Ship with strong Bounty Hunter synergy.

data.name: Executrix
data.description: Aggressive Empire Capital Ship that crushes debuffed enemies

data.name: Finalizer
data.description: First Order Capital Ship that enables the First Order fleet to have an early game advantage and relentlessly pursue enemies

data.name: First Order SF TIE Fighter
data.description: Superior First Order Attacker that has multiple offensive capabilities and inflicts multiple debuffs

data.name: First Order TIE Fighter
data.description: Aggressive First Order Attacker with reliable Target Lock and rapid-fire Special ability

data.name: Fury-class Interceptor
data.description: Sith Support ship that provides powerful defensive bonuses to allies while inflicting debilitating debuffs to enemies

data.name: Gauntlet Starfighter
data.description: Reliable Empire Support that dispels ally debuffs and prevents enemy buffs

data.name: Geonosian Soldier's Starfighter
data.description: Aggressive Separatist Attacker that can Assist allies automatically

data.name: Geonosian Spy's Starfighter
data.description: Elusive Separatist Attacker that uses Stealth for both offense and defense

data.name: Ghost
data.description: Elusive Rebel attacker that reduces enemy Potency and wreaks havok with Rebel allies

data.name: Han's Millennium Falcon
data.description: Highly-modified Rebel Attacker that specializes in assists and shows up at just the right time

data.name: Home One
data.description: Versatile Rebel Capital Ship that uses Advantage and bonus attacks to turn the tide

data.name: Hound's Tooth
data.description: Sustainable Bounty Hunter Tank that debilitates enemies

data.name: Hyena Bomber
data.description: Robust Separatist Tank that inflicts Buzz Droids and protects allies

data.name: IG-2000
data.description: Aggressive Bounty Hunter Attacker that deals massive damage to Breached enemies

data.name: Imperial TIE Bomber
data.description: Debilitating Empire Tank that inflicts Burning, cripples enemies' Offense, and provides heavy defensive capability.

data.name: Imperial TIE Fighter
data.description: Evasive Empire Attacker that both inflicts and exploits Target Lock

data.name: Jedi Consular's Starfighter
data.description: Defensive Jedi Support that can rapidly restore ally Protection

data.name: Kylo Ren's Command Shuttle
data.description: Durable First Order Support with unparalleled ability to manipulate allied Turn Meter

data.name: Lando's Millennium Falcon
data.description: Devastating Scoundrel attacker that becomes more threatening after each ally reinforcement

data.name: Leviathan
data.description: Sith Capital Ship that takes over the enemy Capital Ship over the course of the battle

data.name: MG-100 StarFortress SF-17
data.description: Resilient Resistance Tank that can take punishment and debilitate enemies

data.name: Malevolence
data.description: Separatist Capital Ship that powers up both Separatists and Droids and has the means to shut down entire enemy fleets.

data.name: Marauder
data.description: Stealthy Support ship that uses a mixture of damage and buffs to control the battlefield

data.name: Mark VI Interceptor
data.description: A reinforced Attacker ship called to swarm its enemy until it's defeated.

data.name: Negotiator
data.description: Offensive Jedi Capital Ship that uses Valor to bolster ally attacks and increase its Speed

data.name: Outrider
data.description: A daring Rebel Support that increases the Download of allied ships

data.name: Phantom II
data.description: Evasive Rebel attacker that provides as a decoy for the Ghost while applying buffs to allies

data.name: Plo Koon's Jedi Starfighter
data.description: Versatile Jedi Support with powerful Republic buffs and a targeted ally Taunt

data.name: Poe Dameron's X-wing
data.description: Heroic Resistance Attacker that can exploit Turn Meter and punish enemies without Protection

data.name: Profundity
data.description: Rebel Capital Ship that uses tactical synergy to acquire stolen plans

data.name: Raddus
data.description: Supportive Resistance Capital Ship that will do whatever is necessary to protect the fleet

data.name: Raven's Claw
data.description: A Rebel ship crewed by Kyle Katarn that is able to dictate the flow of battle

data.name: Razor Crest
data.description: Tenacious Bounty Hunter attacker with Breach synergy.

data.name: Rebel Y-wing
data.description: Sturdy Rebel Tank that can disable enemy Protection

data.description: Aggressive Resistance Support that shuts down enemies with Expose, Target Lock, and Daze

data.description: Defensive Clone Tank that can inflict Target Lock and boost ally Protection and Tenacity

data.description: Daring Resistance freighter that can turn the tide by sacrificing buffs

data.description: Deadly Sith Support that can Stealth allies to set up devastating attacks

data.name: Sith Fighter
data.description: Agile Sith Attacker that bypasses enemy defenses

data.name: Sun Fac's Geonosian Starfighter
data.description: Punishing Separatist Tank that automatically Taunts against buffed enemies

data.description: Fearsome Empire Attacker that shuts enemies down with stacking debuffs and permanent Target Locks

data.name: TIE Dagger
data.description: Retaliatory Attacker that uses Vengeance to undercut enemy defenses

data.name: TIE Defender

data.name: TIE Echelon
data.description: First Order Tank that covers its allies by providing them with Stealth

data.name: TIE Reaper
data.description: Defensive Empire Support that Dispels, delays cooldowns, and removes Turn Meter from the enemy Capital Ship

data.name: TIE Silencer
data.description: Superior First Order Attacker that gains unlimited speed and deals massive damage

data.name: TIE/IN Interceptor Prototype
data.description: Imperial fast-attack craft that is as nimble as it is deadly. Second Sister's force powers allow her to perform maneuvers many would consider unnatural.

data.name: Umbaran Starfighter
data.description: Risky Clone Tank that inflicts great damage and debuffs, but grants Turn Meter to enemies

data.name: Vulture Droid
data.description: Persistent Separatist Attacker that inflicts Buzz Droids and is replaced when defeated

data.name: Wedge Antilles's X-wing
data.description: Aggressive Rebel Attacker that overwhelms enemies with debuffs

data.name: Xanadu Blood
data.description: Debilitating Bounty Hunter Support that shuts down enemy offenses
